snippet: André Esteves, the chief executive of the Brazilian bank BTG Pactual, on Monday was fined 350,000 euros ($457,000) for insider trading by the Italian financial regulator.
abstract: André Esteves, the chief executive of the Brazilian bank BTG Pactual, on Monday was fined 350,000 euros ($457,000) for insider trading by the Italian financial regulator.

headline.main: BTG Pactual Chief Fined Over Insider Trading
